title: Immortal
description: From the mind of Gennifer Albin, author of Crewel, comes a new high-concept paranormal world unlike anything you’ve ever seen before.American Gods meets HighlanderWilliam Cavendish died the day we met…and then he came back to life. Born hundreds of years ago, he’s still alive today. Somehow. And when I touch him for the first time, suddenly his memories are just…gone. Still, he came into my life for a reason. The closer we become, the less I trust him or the few memories he has shared with me—but the more certain I am that I’m falling for him. And the more certain I am that I’m what he’s hunting, and that we can never be together.A deliciously suspenseful, romantic tale of being torn between what we want and what we fear from the bestselling author of Crewel.
author: Gennifer Albin
